features: Join your favorite friends with the Paw Patrol Folding Kids and Toddler Activity Table Set from Jakks Pacific!
Designed for durability and safety with sturdy metal tubular construction and double locking mechanism
Easy wipe washable Paw Patrol vinyl table top surface & Paw Patrol chairs for kids and toddlers (quick & easy no hassle cleaning)
Kids sized (ages 36 months up to 7 years) – 24in W Square table top x 20in H, Chair: 13"L x 13.5"W x 21"H, Weight Limit: 70 lbs. Assembly required (tool included)

Customer service: at JAKKS Pacific, your customer feedback is very important to us – should you need to contact us, Please send an email with details to consumers@jakks.com so we can best address your needs – we look forward to doing all that we can to ensure you are happy with your purchase!
body.description: With this table and 2 chair set from JAKKS Pacific, sitting at the kid's table has never been more fun. With bright colored chairs and table, your children are bound to have a blast whether they're eating, playing games, drawing, or learning. Perfect for playrooms, classrooms, day cares, Sunday schools and kids rooms. The set includes bright character graphics which is ideal for children's rooms. A terrific way for children to socialize and learn table manners. Use as a game table, LEGO table or a place to put your children's favorite toys, puzzles, and coloring books. A must-have for day cares and nurseries. Also ideal for waiting rooms, and doctor's office, and any space where children need a play place. Sturdy metal tubular steel construction: water-resistant and durable, this table and chairs set will withstand all children's play time. Easy to clean surface and easy to assemble: Table and chairs set come disassembled and can be put together easily with the included tool. Promote your child's imagination while providing them a safe and colorful place to learn & play with this fun and colorful table and chairs set. So sit back and enjoy the freedom your kids will experience, by having a table of their very own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Siper cute /but flimsy
reviews.reviewText: It works as it should. But it's basically thick card board with plastic over it. Can't handle much weight on the actual table.But you get what you pay for..easy to clean and doors the job

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect toddler table
reviews.reviewText: Perfect toddler table. It wipes clean easily. I wish it came with 4 chairs though. Something did stain the light blue part but I’m not surprised and it doesn’t look bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: Love this table and chair set for my almost 3 year old! Only issue is that the table has a soft cushion top that is NOT ideal for writing.Easy open legs!Leg locks are perfect to ensure my little one doesn't fall or pinch his fingers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, just what my great grand needed.
reviews.reviewText: A useful purchase for my Great Grand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect kid table
reviews.reviewText: "Paw Patrol is on the roll," and so is our toddler with this puptastic kids' table! It's exactly what we were looking for to cater to our little one's desire for independence, providing him with his own space to play and work. Given our small home, we needed something easily storable when not in use, and this table fits the bill perfectly.The folding legs of the table and chairs, along with the chairs folding flat, make it incredibly convenient to store when not needed. The fact that both the top and chairs are easily wipeable adds to the practicality, ensuring quick and hassle-free cleanup. We're confident that our son is going to have hours of fun with this table set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my granddaughter and she loves it

reviews.reviewText: This table was perfect for my 3 year old nephew. It was the perfect height, and he still has plenty room to grow with the table in the future.
